articles.description: “I hope one day, we all choose to grow up,” Kirsten Corley captioned the excerpted passage from Maya Angelou’s essay “Home.”
articles.content:
Chance the Rapper’s wife is hoping people “grow up.”
About a week after Chance went viral for dancing “inappropriately” with another woman, his wife, Kirsten Corley, shared a cryptic message on her … [+1906 chars]
